content:
Add-AzureADScopedRoleMembership

Adds a scoped role membership to an administrative unit.

Syntax

Add-AzureADScopedRoleMembership [-AdministrativeUnitObjectId <String>] -ObjectId <String>
 [-RoleMemberInfo <RoleMemberInfo>] [-RoleObjectId <String>] [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Add-AzureADScopedRoleMembership cmdlet adds a scoped role membership to an administrative unit.

Parameters

-AdministrativeUnitObjectId

Specifies the ID of an admininstrative unit.

Type:String
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ObjectId
Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName, ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RoleMemberInfo

Specifies a RoleMemberInfo object.

Type:RoleMemberInfo
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RoleObjectId
Type:String
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureADScopedRoleMembership
  • Remove-AzureADScopedRoleMembership
